thread.section_title: PickleballCentral Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PickleballCentral | pickleballcentral.com
thread.title: Barbara

author: Barbara
title: Barbara
text:
I am a new player to Pickle Ball. Even though I ended up returning the paddle I purchased from PickleballCentral, they were extremely helpful in helping explain the differences between paddles and getting me the weight of paddle I wanted.
The return was simple and they were also very helpful and friendly on the phone.
The return was made because I hadn't really tried a variety of paddles prior to purchasing one. Had nothing to do with quality or the company.
